name: unicls

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1), wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(⋃(Clsd ` c0)= c1, ⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1, c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1)
-| wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1)
-| wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0))
-| wi(wa(wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0))), wceq(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)= c1
⊣ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0)
⊣ ((⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))→ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)= c1)

stmt.origin: mpbi(wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1), wss(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1)

⊣ (Clsd ` c0)⊆ P(c1)
⊣ ((Clsd ` c0)⊆ P(c1)↔ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:

-| wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0))
-| wi(wa(wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0))), wceq(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1))
-| wb(wss(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(cfv(ccld, c0)), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0)
⊣ ((⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))→ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)= c1)
⊣ ((Clsd ` c0)⊆ P(c1)↔ ⋃(Clsd ` c0)⊆ c1)
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0

body.origin:
|- wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0))
-| wcel(c0, ctop)
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0)
⊣ c0 ∈ Top
⊣ (c0 ∈ Top → c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))

⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0

⊣ (c0 ∈ Top → c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))

comment: The union of the closed set is the underlying set of the topology. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)
